Question: Shenzhen Zhaowei Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen ZHAOWEI Machinery & Electronics Co., Ltd.

Product Highlight: Planetary Gear Motors and Gearboxes

- Offers a wide range of precision gear motors and planetary gearboxes with diameters ranging from 3.4 to 38 mm, voltages from 1.5–24V, power from 0.01–40W, output speed from 5–2000rpm, reduction ratio from 5–1500, and output torque from 1 gf. cm–50 kgf.cm
- Provides encoder and control system modules
- Specializes in transmission design, mold manufacturing, part production, and assembly services
- Utilizes advanced technology such as mold flow analysis, gearbox design platform, dynamic simulation, and finite element analysis
- Emphasizes precision fabrication and quality assurance with high-precision processing machines and measurement devices
- Offers automated production with injection molding and servo mechanical control
- Widely used in automotive, communication devices, home automation, medical applications, consumer electronics, and intelligent robots

For more information, visit: https://www.szzhaowei.net
Summary_cn:
深圳赵威机械电子有限公司。

产品亮点：行星齿轮电机和齿轮箱

- 提供广泛的精密齿轮电机和行星齿轮箱，直径范围从3.4到38毫米，电压范围从1.5-24伏特，功率范围从0.01-40瓦特，输出速度范围从5-2000转/分钟，减速比范围从5-1500，输出扭矩范围从1 gf. cm-50 kgf.cm
- 提供编码器和控制系统模块
- 专业从事传动设计、模具制造、零件生产和组装服务
- 利用先进技术，如模流分析、齿轮箱设计平台、动态仿真和有限元分析
- 重视精密加工和质量保证，配备高精度加工设备和测量设备
- 提供注塑成型和伺服机械控制的自动化生产
- 广泛应用于汽车、通信设备、家庭自动化、医疗应用、消费电子和智能机器人等领域

了解更多信息，请访问：https://www.szzhaowei.net
